welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# GCommands

--- ## üìÇ | Installation ```sh npm install gcommands yarn add gcommands # Dev Build npm install gcommands@dev yarn add gcommands@dev ``` ## üê¢ | Guide & Documentation To help you learn more about GCommands we have a [guide](https://gcommands.js.org/guide/) and [documentation](https://gcommands.js.org/docs/) for you. If you're still in trouble, you can join our [Garlic Team](https://discord.gg/AjKJSBbGm2) discord server. ## üëÄ | Features - Command Handler, Event Handler - Supports slash, legacy and context menus commands - Supports custom i18n messages - Supports discord.js v13 - Simply have a legacy and slash command in 1 file - Supports many types of arguments

classes.name: GCommandsClient
classes.description: The main hub for interacting with the Discord API, and the starting point for any bot.

props.name: cmdDir
props.description: The path to the command files

props.name: eventDir
props.description: The path to the event files

props.name: componentDir
props.description: The path to the component files

props.name: loadFromCache
props.description: Wheter loading from cache is enabled

props.name: deleteNonExistent
props.description: Wheter auto deleting non existent commands is enabled

props.name: allowDm
props.description: Wheter commands in DM are enabled

props.name: caseSensitiveCommands
props.description: Whether case sensitive commands is enabled

props.name: caseSensitivePrefixes
props.description: Wheter case sensitive prefix is enabled

props.name: deletePrompt
props.description: Wheter deleting the prompt is enabled

props.name: deleteInput
props.description: Wheter deleting the input is enabled

props.name: wait
props.description: How long a user has to respond to a argument prompt

events.name: commandError
events.description: Emitted when a error occurs inside a command

events.name: commandsLoaded
events.description: Emitted when all commands are loaded

events.name: commandNotFound
events.description: Emitted when a command is not found

typedefs.name: ArgumentType
typedefs.description:
ArgumentType
* SUB_COMMAND
* SUB_COMMAND_GROUP
* STRING
* INTEGER
* BOOLEAN
* USER
* CHANNEL
* ROLE
* MENTIONABLE
* NUMBER

typedefs.name: GCommandsOptionsLanguage
typedefs.description:
The GCommandsOptionsLanguage
* english
* spanish
* portuguese
* russian
* german
* czech
* slovak
* turkish
* polish
* indonesian
* italian
* french

typedefs.description:
The GCommandsOptionsCommandsContext
* both
* user
* message
* false

The GCommandsOptionsCommandsSlash

typedefs.name: Inhibitor
typedefs.description: The Inhibitor You can see guide to get a better idea of how inhibitors work.

typedefs.name: GPayloadOptions
typedefs.description:
Base options provided when sending.
<info>You can also see [discord.js docs](https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/MessageOptions) for more info.</info>

typedefs.name: CommandOptions
typedefs.description:
The CommandOptions
<info>`channelThreadOnly` is only for d.js v13</info>

typedefs.name: ArgumentChannelTypes
typedefs.description:
ArgumentChannelTypes

* DM
* GUILD_TEXT
* GUILD_VOICE
* GUILD_CATEGORY
* GUILD_NEWS
* GUILD_STORE
* GUILD_NEWS_THREAD
* GUILD_PUBLIC_THREAD
* GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD
* GUILD_STAGE_VOICE

typedefs.name: ApplicationCommandType
typedefs.description:
The type of an {@link ApplicationCommand} object:
* CHAT_INPUT
* USER
* MESSAGE

typedefs.name: GInteractionType
typedefs.description:
The type of an {@link GInteraction} object:
* PING
* APPLICATION_COMMAND
* MESSAGE_COMPONENT

typedefs.name: MessageComponentType
typedefs.description:
The type of a message component
* ACTION_ROW
* BUTTON
* SELECT_MENU
